column1: Local Foods////Seeing how this restaurant is listed on yelp as Houston's top restaurant choice
column2: Â you can feel confident dropping 11 or so dollars and cross it off your to-try list. But I also agree with others
column3: spending $11 dollars on a sandwich and small sides would make a college student feel guilty
column4: especially when there's Chick fil a and Guru Burger's lunch special. Those are more of a bang for your buck. But heres the catch
column6: your stomach feels healthier. You feel good knowing that you're helping local farmers. And of course the causal but hipsterish vibe is enjoyable.
